Articles.Content: Heyall. Im stuck at work all day (boooo) but when I get home Im hoping to give a crack at getting KSP2 loaded onto my macbook using parallels. Has anyone had any luck with this kind of thing today?

I'm playing it on bootcamp right now. Performance on medium preset is about what I'd expect. Laggy when looking at Kerbin and when first taking off, but other than that no real issues. Parallels might be a bit too far though.
